hero.title: Thought is
hero.subtitle1: Every Slack thread is a graveyard of ideas.

product.title: This is a reasoning engine.
product.subtitle1: Not Notion. Not a chatbot. Not a wiki.

structured.title: Structured reasoning
structured.description: Break down complex problems into nodes and logical connections. Make implicit reasoning explicit. See the architecture of your thinking.

validation.title: Path validation
validation.description: Mark reasoning paths as valid or invalid. Track what works. Build on truth.

references.title: Cross-references
references.description: Link canvases without duplication. Reuse conclusions. Let knowledge compound.

collaboration.title: Team collaboration
collaboration.description: Role-based access. Contextual comments. Real-time updates. Think together, decide faster, build stronger.

founders.title: Founders
founders.description: Make better decisions. Document your reasoning. Stop rehashing the same arguments every quarter.

researchers.title: Researchers
researchers.description: Map literature. Build frameworks. Turn papers into structured knowledge graphs that actually make sense.

engineers.title: Engineers
engineers.description: Design systems. Debug logic. Document architectural decisions that actually matter and won't be lost.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Simple. Transparent. Fair.
pricing.footer: Try free with Demo mode. No credit card required.

cta.subtitle: Join researchers, founders, and engineers who actually ship.
